entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow this evening then to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
